extDesc.message: A draggable jump panel to navigate messages in ChatGPT conversations.

optSub.message: These settings are saved locally and take effect automatically on ChatGPT pages.

chkDefaultHidden.message: Hide panel by default (use icon/hotkey to show)

chkParityReverse.message: Reverse parity (if user/assistant order looks swapped)

hintSelector.message: Custom selector is used to locate message text nodes. When enabled, role mode defaults to “No role” to avoid unstable role detection.

hintRole.message: Tip: When custom selector is enabled, role mode defaults to “No role”. You may switch back if it still works for you.

chkRequireSrOnly.message: Require :scope > .sr-only to treat an item as valid

hintSrOnly.message: If enabled, elements without a non-empty direct child .sr-only will be ignored. Disable this when your custom selector doesn’t include .sr-only.

statusSaved.message: Saved ✅ (Go back to ChatGPT and it will apply automatically)
